Attributes:
-If your target is attacked both you and your attacker will die instead. (You can be healed by a Doctor)
-Your counterattack ignores night immunity.
-You have 1 bullet proof vest like survivor, and can not die with it on.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Special Attributes: Ignores Night Immunity.

Note: Killable roles include Godfather, Mafioso, Serial Killer, Arsonist and Vigilante.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is a protector. They must be a Bodyguard, Jailor, or a Lookout.
Consigliere - Your target is a trained protector, they must be a BodyGuard.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town

Abilities: Heal one person each night, preventing them from dying.

Attributes:
-You may heal yourself once.
-You will know if your target is attacked.

Goal: Lynch every criminal and evildoer.

Note(s):
-You can heal kills made by a Veteran.
-You can heal Escorts/Consorts/Jailors stabbed by the Serial Killer.
-You can heal kills made by a Bodyguard.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Not Suspicious
Investigator - Your target is good with knives. They are either a Doctor or a Serial Killer
Consigliere - Your target is a professional surgeon, they must be a Doctor.

Win Conditions:
Must kill all Mafia
Must kill Serial Killer
Must kill Arsonist
Win kill Werewolves
Wins with Survivors
Wins with Town
